website_summaries.verdict: More than 100 types of knitting needles and yarn working tools in this value-priced kit.
pros: Circular needles and crochet hooks are included
This kit keeps a lot of knitting tools well organized
Strong needles, with a nice carrying bag
cons: The sizes are not marked on the needles, but the kit does come with a gauge to help you identify sizes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I purchase knitting needles in a set. This kit has everything a knitter needs in a convenient case.
customer_reviews.author: Caridad Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was excited about how neat and organized the kit was and how much came with it
customer_reviews.author: alice dube

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Everything you need. Buy and enjoy knitting!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for me and the price is good. I would buy this set for a friend as a gift. I like the case and large variety of things.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: Durable, Affordable, Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. The needles are durable and all the straight needles are double pointed and you get two of each. The case makes it easy to store everything carefully and by size and the price point is great for the value.
customer_reviews.author: Yanique

customer_reviews.title: Very nicely pointed, good quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set. The tips are nice pointed, not blunt like other sets I’ve purchased here. I would have given it 5 stars had a circular needle not been missing. I will be contacting the seller about this and will change the rating afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Price was good.
customer_reviews.text: Because they are steal they are slippery. Not a bad product for beginners
customer_reviews.author: Amy C. Barnhart

customer_reviews.title: Great double needle wire needle set
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, strong, all kinds of usage. Stuff can fall out of sides if not careful.
customer_reviews.author: SuperSwoop

customer_reviews.title: A needle stopper/pointer is needed if you are going to use for straight knitting.
customer_reviews.text: The needle sizes are not US compatible, but a lot of needles for the price. I'll figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but sent back and to returns were easy.
customer_reviews.text: Kit wasn't in US sizing, but sent back and to returns were easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love love except the needles are marked in size which aren’t correct
customer_reviews.author: tracy bogner

customer_reviews.title: They work well
customer_reviews.text: The product is so cool,only it don’t have the smaller 40 or 16” circular needles only one size the larger size
customer_reviews.author: Jaymes

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to take up knitting. It had everything I needed in a nice organizer. I like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Although it said ' NEW ' the needles looked old and blunt and of poor quality. I was dissapointed. Kept it as shipping it back is a hassle for me.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous
